edu.wpi.cs.wpisuitetng.modules.requirementmanager.models.iterations

Class IterationModel

  • java.lang.Object
    • javax.swing.AbstractListModel
      • edu.wpi.cs.wpisuitetng.modules.requirementmanager.models.iterations.IterationModel
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, javax.swing.ListModel

    public class IterationModel
extends javax.swing.AbstractListModel
    List of Iterations being pulled from the server

      • addIteration

        public void addIteration(Iteration newIter)
        Adds a single Iteration to the Iterations of the project
        Parameters:
        newIter - Iteration

      • getSize

        public int getSize()
        Provides the number of elements in the list of Iterations for the project. This function is called internally by the JList in NewIterationPanel. Returns elements in reverse order, so the newest Iteration is returned first.
        Returns:
        the number of Iterations in the project * @see javax.swing.ListModel#getSize() * @see javax.swing.ListModel#getSize() * @see javax.swing.ListModel#getSize()

      • getNextID

        public int getNextID()
        Provides the next ID number that should be used for a new Iteration that is created.
        Returns:
        the next open id number

      • getElementAt

        public Iteration getElementAt(int index)
        This function takes an index and finds the Iteration in the list of Iterations for the project. Used internally by the JList in NewIterationModel.
        Parameters:
        index - The index of the Iteration to be returned
        Returns:
        the Iteration associated with the provided index * @see javax.swing.ListModel#getElementAt(int) * @see javax.swing.ListModel#getElementAt(int) * @see javax.swing.ListModel#getElementAt(int)

      • emptyModel

        public void emptyModel()
        Removes all Iterations from this model NOTE: One cannot simply construct a new instance of the model, because other classes in this module have references to it. Hence, we manually remove each Iteration from the model.

      • addIterations

        public void addIterations(Iteration[] Iterations)
        Adds the given array of Iterations to the list
        Parameters:
        Iterations - the array of Iterations to add

      • getIterations

        public java.util.List<Iteration> getIterations()
        Returns the list of the Iterations
        Returns:
        the Iterations held within the Iterationmodel.

      • getIteration

        public Iteration getIteration(java.lang.String forName)
        Return the iteration with the specified name
        Parameters:

        Returns:
        the iteration

      • getConflictingIteration

        public Iteration getConflictingIteration(java.util.Date start,
                                java.util.Date end)
        Returns the earliest iteration that conflicts with the given dates
        Parameters:
        start - the begin date
        end - the end date
        Returns:
        the conflicting iteration

      • getIterationForDate

        public java.util.List<Iteration> getIterationForDate(java.util.Date date)
        Returns the iterations that the given date falls in. A date can fall within 2 iterations if it is the end of one iteration and the start of another iteration.
        Parameters:
        date - the date to check for
        Returns:
        the iterations

      • getBacklog

        public Iteration getBacklog()
        Returns the backlog iteration
        Returns:
        backlog iteration
